info.name: Twitter.com Suppress Blocked Users, Moments
info.description: This style completely suppresses any tweets from users you have blocked, including in searches. It also removes the "Moments" tab because-- why?
info.additionalInfo:
Change Log:

  • 2016-02-03- Also disable Moments tab.
